description: Scopri i migliori hotel a Rarotonga, Cook Islands. Trova offerte esclusive e alloggi di lusso.

hotels.title: Exclusive Cook Islands Beachfront Private Villa Complex for 8 Guests with One-Way Airport Transfer
hotels.description: Discover bungalow-style luxury at this exquisite villa complex, where private resort living meets the balmy shores of the Cook Islands. Welcome to Waterfoot House, a four-suite private villa that offers unparalleled privacy and comfort, creating the perfect sanctuary with the elegance of a standalone estate. Nestled within lush tropical gardens, the villa complex is all yours, with no shared spaces and no other guests. Open-plan living spaces invite you to relax, dine and unwind in style, while offering the privacy of four ensuite bedrooms. Enjoy a stunning 20-metre beachfront lap pool, a spacious BBQ pavilion and breezy poolside dining areas all to yourself - ideal for laid-back afternoons or hosting unforgettable evenings. Whether you’re strolling along the beach, diving into the vibrant lagoon or exploring the island on a booked tour, everything you need for a luxurious Cook Islands escape is at your doorstep.

hotels.title: Cook Islands Adults-Only Beachfront Retreat with Spa & Swim-Up Bar
hotels.description: Indulge in ultimate relaxation amid stunning tropical scenery with this idyllic adults-only retreat nestled on the pristine shores of Rarotonga. This resort offers a serene escape on the edge of Aroa Lagoon Marine Reserve, a vibrant underwater playground. Savour the flavours of the South Pacific at the resort's Bluewater Grill & Bar, unwind with a fruity cocktail at the dreamy swim-up pool bar or with a relaxing treatment at the spa, or take advantage of complimentary watersports.

hotels.title: Year-Round Cook Islands Beachfront Paradise overlooking Muri Lagoon
hotels.description: Coddled by pristine palm-fringed shores, Muri Beach Resort offers a perennial gateway to the idyllic Cook Islands. Enjoy days in the sun, whether snorkelling and kayaking in the crystal clear Muri Lagoon or reclining on the deck, gazing upon Rarotonga's warm sands with a cocktail in hand. The only ECO-resort operation in the Cook Islands, this retreat is one of a kind. Dip in the swimming pool nestled between palm trees, and enjoy the sandy beaches of Muri Beach.

hotels.title: Cook Islands Five-Star Private Pool Villas
hotels.description: Embrace the splendour of the South Pacific with a romantic escape at the five-star Rumours Luxury Villas & Spa. Set in a beautiful beachfront location, just steps from the gorgeous white sands of Muri Beach and its crystal-clear lagoon, this luxurious resort boasts everything you need for a dreamlike escape from reality, from beautifully designed villas complete with private pools and gardens to the award-winning Waterfall Spa and tropical marine life in the glistening lagoon.

hotels.vendor_name: Te Manava Luxury Villas and Spa
hotels.title: Beachfront Cook Islands Villa Paradise with Onsite Dining, Spa & Private Beach Access
hotels.description: From sapphire waters and white-sand beaches to lush rainforests dotted with towering volcanic peaks, the five-star Te Manava Luxury Villas & Spa might be the escape of your dreams. Superbly located on Muri Beach, Te Manava Luxury Villas & Spa lends itself to lazy days spent sunbathing and kayaking. The boutique collection of 13 self-contained villas offers one-, two- and three-bedroom options, with plenty of space to seek a South Pacific adventure. Sip cocktails by your villa's private pool, enjoying treatments at the spa, hike your way through trails that weave across the island and kayak across the crystal-clear lagoon. Voted “World’s Leading Island Villas” by the World Travel Awards, this haven features a spa with internationally trained therapists. Enjoy complimentary pick-up and drop-off to sister property Pacific Resort Rarotonga, where additional resort facilities await - including a lagoon-style pool, a dedicated kids’ pool, beachfront bar and restaurant, and a daily schedule of cultural activities such as coconut cream-making demonstrations and crab races. Te Manava offers an unforgettable South Pacific experience for all ages.

hotels.title: South Pacific's First Adults-Only Art Resort with Direct Beach Access & Complimentary Electric Bicycles
hotels.description: Trade in the bustle of daily life for long, blissful days on an island paradise at the adults-only Motu Beachfront Art Villas. Here, your only duty is to disconnect from the rest of the world and enjoy soul-stirring Pacific artwork that's peppered across the resort. With only 10 luxury villas onsite, enjoy a secluded and intimate escape - relax by the pool with an ice-cold beer in hand, or paddle out to the crystal-clear lagoon to snorkel or kayak.

hotels.title: Boutique Rarotonga Tropical Cook Islands Luxury
hotels.description: Escape to the unspoiled beauty of the Cook Islands with a stay at the boutique Pacific Resort Rarotonga. Comprised of a collection of breathtaking rooms, suites and villas scattered across more than five acres of manicured beachfront gardens, Pacific Resort Rarotonga is a charming South Pacific hideaway with friendly, personalised service, ideally positioned right on the crystal-clear waters of Muri Lagoon. Thanks to an array of water activities, you can explore the colourful reefs with ease and enjoy a world of underwater adventures every day. When you are ready to indulge in delicious food, Sandals Restaurant offers dining garden side while the Barefoot Bar offers refreshing cocktails.

hotels.title: Cook Islands Private Pool Villa Haven Overlooking Rarotonga's Muri Lagoon
hotels.description: Experience the unspoiled beauty of the Cook Islands with a stay at the Nautilus Resort, ideally positioned on Rarotonga's gorgeous white sands overlooking the crystal-clear waters of Muri Lagoon. Fall into the groove of island time and escape the rigors of the everyday at this boutique haven with just 17 freestanding, Polynesian-style eco-friendly luxury Ares (villas), each with their own private plunge pool. Thanks to an array of water activities, you can explore the colourful reefs with ease and enjoy a world of underwater adventures every day. When you are ready to further indulge, Nautilus Restaurant offers award-winning beachfront fare and tempting cocktails, while Spa Nautilus offers rejuvenating body treatments sure to make your stay one to remember.

hotels.title: Brand-New Cook Islands Barefoot Luxury Villas with Rarotonga's Only Fresh Ocean Lagoon Pool
hotels.description: Immerse yourself in the breathtaking beauty of Rarotonga with a relaxing stay at the newly opened Ocean Escape Resort & Spa. Discover a tropical Cook Islands paradise of sparkling turquoise waters, densely forested landscapes dotted with jagged volcanic peaks, and pristine beaches. This eco-friendly, adults-only oasis (16+) is a haven for sun-soaked days and serenity, perfect for romantic escapes. Located near the spectacular Muri Beach, this is the perfect opportunity to practice your snorkelling and diving skills with breathtaking coral reefs and exhilarating marine life. Explore the lush forests and volcanic peaks if you’re feeling adventurous, or browse the nearby local markets in search of hidden treasures. Enhance your stay with the indulgent offerings of the new Essential Spa, where rejuvenating treatments and massages await, inspired by the natural beauty of the Cook Islands. In the evenings, unwind at the resort’s sophisticated cocktail bar, offering a curated menu of signature drinks and refreshing tropical concoctions to enjoy as the sun dips below the horizon. Dive into the resort’s expansive saltwater lagoon pool, complete with a living coral reef (the only one of its kind on Rarotonga). Relax on your private balcony or step straight onto the beach from the resort and wander along the sandy shores to watch the sun rise or set over the ocean. If you’re lucky, you may even catch whales migrating just a short distance from the beach at certain times of the year.

hotels.title: Secluded Cook Islands Family Escape on Secluded Aroa Beach
hotels.description: Dive into island adventure and romance at The Rarotongan Beach Resort & Lagoonarium, a beachfront escape set on the shores of Aroa Lagoon. Perfect for couples and families alike, the resort offers unforgettable guided night snorkelling tours through its vibrant marine sanctuary. By day, enjoy The Rarotongan’s extensive free daily activities, stand-up paddleboarding, kayaking and more await just steps from your suite. Families will love the interconnecting accommodation options, while couples can sip sunset cocktails or plan a dream beach wedding with the help of a dedicated personal wedding planner. Whether you're basking on the sand, unwinding with a spa massage or dining beachside at Captain Andy’s, this tropical haven offers the ultimate Cook Islands experience.

hotels.title: Cook Island Sunset Coast Beachfront Retreat
hotels.description: Spend days lazing on sugar-white beaches or floating in a turquoise lagoon at Crown Beach Resort & Spa, a spectacular resort stretched across Raratonga's sunset coast. Ranked in the top 10% of resorts worldwide by Tripadvisor, this sun-soaked beachfront escape is set within five acres of gardens with everything you could need for an indulgent island retreat. Treat yourself to a pampering treatment at the Spa Ariki, hire kayaks and snorkelling equipment and hit the ocean or lagoon for a fun-filled afternoon, rent a bicycle and explore the island, take a dip in the waterfall swimming pool, and enjoy the convenience of a supermarket, general store, bakery and liquor store just across the road. When hunger strikes, pull up a chair at Ocean's Restaurant, a waterfront venue serving up fresh local seafood, or opt for succulent meat cuts and local fish char-grilled to perfection at Flambe. At the outdoor bar, order a cocktail or a flute of bubbly and watch a spectacular sunset dip below the horizon.

hotels.title: Rarotonga Adults-Only Beachfront Bliss
hotels.description: Unwind and soak up the unspoiled beauty and traditional soul of the Cook Islands with a stay at the award-winning Little Polynesian Resort, a member of the prestigious Small Luxury Hotels of the World collection and winner of a Tripadvisor Travellers' Choice 2021 award. Set amid the secluded beauty of Rarotonga, the resort allows you to escape the ordinary and find your own slice of Polynesian paradise. Spend your days floating in the aquamarine lagoon, walking across the white-sand beach and sitting out on your veranda, watching palm trees sway in the seaside breeze. Enjoy world-class facilities, including an infinity pool with elegant lounge chairs and umbrellas, a beach with stunning white sand, a resort bar for refreshments and a restaurant offering traditional Polynesian and modern European fare with spectacular views over Titikaveka Lagoon.
